problem.markdown:
1. To add component in schematic which tool is used ? ( ) Cut Tool ( ) Net Tool (x) Add Tool ( ) Change Tool
2. To add pathway for component in schematic, the tool is used ? ( ) Wire Tool ( ) Erc Tool (x) Net Tool ( ) Bus Tool
3. Export image format of Schematic in Eagle ? (x) .png format ( ) .bmp format ( ) .rml format ( ) .brd format
4. High resolution for mini milling machine ? ( ) 200 dpi (x) 500 dpi ( ) 1000 dpi ( ) 2400 dpi
5. Which is the correct option to make a board ? ( ) File --> Export (x) File --> Switch to Board ( ) File --> Camm Processor ( ) File --> Run
problem.p: 1. To add component in schematic which tool is used ?
2. To add pathway for component in schematic, the tool is used ?
3. Export image format of Schematic in Eagle ?
4. High resolution for mini milling machine ?
5. Which is the correct option to make a board ?
